segmentosSRT.text: Let's not bring up the past.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
Burn them, okay?
I've got other people to see.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: And we've painted Chairman Mao's portrait.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: You're just in time. We've just finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Lunch is all taken care of.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Dad, Mom, we're having a baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
I just came from the hospital.
The doctor says it's due in autumn.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's going to be a mother.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: He's been arrested as a capitalist.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: They held a public trial against him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: We have to draw a line between us and him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I've always felt terrible about Youqing.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: They say she's great. No problems.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: From the contractions, not right now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Go ask where the doctors are.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
They're all reactionaries.
We've overthrown them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
This is the same Wang Bin
who once insulted...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
me and my wife,
saying she wasn't fit to reproduce.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I was putting on a show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I wanted you here for her sake.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
We should've bought them
on the way home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Now we've got to carry them!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
No, you're tired. You two have a rest.
I'll do it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13
